snippet: John O. Brennan, President Obama’s top counterterrorism adviser, said strikes targeting suspected militants always come after extensive deliberations.
abstract: Pres Obama’s top counterterrorism adviser John O Brennan says drone strikes targeting suspected militants come only after extensive deliberations; use of armed drones in places like Pakistan and Yemen has grown dramatically under the Obama administration, leading to growing concerns about civilian casualties and about a future in which other countries also acquire drones.
lead_paragraph: John O. Brennan, President Obama’s top counterterrorism adviser, said strikes targeting suspected militants always come after extensive deliberations.
